text: Paulo Afonso da Rocha Junior (born 5 November 1997) is a Brazilian footballer also known as “Juninho” who plays as a Forward. ==References== ==External links== *Juninho Rocha at Soccerway *Juninho Rocha at Official Liga MX Profile *Juninho Rocha at Fichajes *Juninho Rocha at Flashscore Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Cafetaleros de Chiapas footballers
title: Juninho Rocha
